mapper.select: SELECT c.client_id, c.email, c.password, c.name, c.date_of_birth, c.country, c.is_admin, ci.type, ci.value FROM client c INNER JOIN client_identification ci ON c.client_id = ci.client_id WHERE c.email = #{email} ORDER BY c.client_id
SELECT type, value FROM client_identification ORDER BY client_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client (client_id, email, password, name, date_of_birth, country, is_admin, curr_balance) VALUES ( #{client.clientId}, #{client.email}, #{client.password}, #{client.name}, #{client.dateOfBirth}, #{client.country}, #{client.isAdmin}, #{clientPortfolio.currBalance} )
mapper.select: SELECT cp.client_id, cp.investment_purpose, cp.income_category, cp.length_of_investment, cp.percentage_of_spend, cp.risk_tolerance, cp.is_advisor_accepted FROM CLIENT_PREFERENCES cp WHERE cp.client_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client_preferences ( client_id, investment_purpose, income_category, length_of_investment, percentage_of_spend, risk_tolerance, is_advisor_accepted ) VALUES ( #{clientId}, #{investmentPurpose}, #{incomeCategory}, #{lengthOfInvestment}, #{percentageOfSpend}, #{riskTolerance}, #{acceptAdvisor} )
mapper.update: UPDATE client_preferences SET investment_purpose = #{investmentPurpose}, income_category = #{incomeCategory}, length_of_investment = #{lengthOfInvestment}, percentage_of_spend = #{percentageOfSpend}, risk_tolerance = #{riskTolerance}, is_advisor_accepted = #{acceptAdvisor} WHERE client_id = #{clientId}
